p.d: Pokou is a princess who just loves learning. She is studying the Komian spiritual rituals, an African method of initiation. Unfortunately, the boundaries between the real world and the unknown world are tenuous and the adversaries that Pokou has to confront are increasingly formidable. Directed by: Abel Kouamé (season 2, Côte d'Ivoire, 2018) Adapted from an original idea by Kan Shouffle.
